manage_repositories.long: Easily manage your organizations and your repositories in your sidebar and add extra projects.

persistant_config.title: Feel at home anywhere
persistant_config.short: Ready to work once logged in. Your preferences are saved and ready to help you to get sh*#t done!
persistant_config.long: Ready to work once logged in. Your preferences are saved and ready to help you on all your Apple computers.

hero.title: Gitscout account benefits
hero.intro: Gitscout is more than an issues viewer. It helps you manage and plan your work with smart features across all your Apple computers. Don't worry, your data will always be in a safe place.
